search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for RSS by Zapier (rss.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for RSS.com Podcast Hosting can be found at: [https://rss.com/pricing/](https://rss.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Podcast Hosting Pricing | RSS.com
=============== 

You are using an old version of Internet Explorer, which is not supported any more by Microsoft.  
To fully take advantage of our service, we recommend to user a modern browser, such as [Google Chrome](https://www.google.com/chrome/).

[](https://rss.com/)

[Sign In](https://dashboard.rss.com/auth/sign-in/) [Sign up for free](https://dashboard.rss.com/auth/sign-up/)

Podcasting made easy

Simple plans to fit your budget and needs.
==========================================

**Create your podcast**, upload your first episode and try all the features **without paying a dime**.

![Image 3](https://rss.com/svg/pricing/Background.svg)

### Student & NGO

from $ 4.99 /month

Special discounts for students, educators and non-governmental organizations worldwide. Automatic approval for .edu email holders.

*   Unlimited episodes
*   Unlimited audio
*   Audio-to-video conversion
*   Episode transcripts
*   Cross-platform analytics
*   RSS feed for your podcast
*   Website for your show
*   Custom embedded player
*   Episode scheduling
*   Auto submission
    
    We’ll automatically submit your podcast to podcast directories including Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Amazon Music, YouTube Music, and more!
    
*   Automatic distribution
    
    Upload your episodes in one place and we’ll automatically distribute them to all the podcast directories including Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Amazon Music, YouTube Music, and more!
    
*   Apple Podcasts Subscription Support
*   Social media sharing
*   Customer support

[Get started for free](https://dashboard.rss.com/auth/sign-up/)

25% Discount applied

### All in One Podcasting

$ 15.99 $ 11.99 /monthif paid annually

One price, unlimited features. Ideal for new podcasters, independent podcasters, and businesses of any size.

25% discount applied!

Billing: MonthlyAnnual

[Get started for free](https://dashboard.rss.com/auth/sign-up/)

*   Unlimited episodes
*   Unlimited audio
*   Audio-to-video conversion
*   Episode transcripts
*   Cross-platform analytics
*   Monetization via sponsors
*   RSS feed for your podcast
*   Website for your show
*   Custom embedded player
*   Episode scheduling
*   Auto submission
    
    We’ll automatically submit your podcast to podcast directories including Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Amazon Music, YouTube Music, and more!
    
*   Automatic distribution
    
    Upload your episodes in one place and we’ll automatically distribute them to all the podcast directories including Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Amazon Music, YouTube Music, and more!
    
*   Apple Podcasts Subscription Support
*   Social media sharing
*   24/7 Customer support

[Get started for free](https://dashboard.rss.com/auth/sign-up/)

No credit card information required

### Podcast Networks

$ 24.99 $ 18.75 /monthif paid annually

Host multiple shows on one account with our Podcast Networks plan. With 24/7 support and detailed analytics, you'll have everything you need to elevate your business or brand.

25% discount applied!

Billing: MonthlyAnnual

[Get started for free](https://dashboard.rss.com/auth/sign-up/)

*   Unlimited podcasts
*   Unlimited episodes
*   Unlimited audio
*   Audio-to-video conversion
*   Episode transcripts
*   Cross-platform analytics
*   Monetization via sponsors
*   RSS feed for your podcast
*   Website for your show
*   Custom embedded player
*   Episode scheduling
*   Auto submission
    
    We’ll automatically submit your podcast to podcast directories including Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Amazon Music, YouTube Music, and more!
    
*   Automatic distribution
    
    Upload your episodes in one place and we’ll automatically distribute them to all the podcast directories including Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Amazon Music, YouTube Music, and more!
    
*   Apple Podcasts Subscription Support
*   Social media sharing
*   24/7 Customer support
*   Monetization opportunities via Dynamic Ad Insertion for high-traffic shows.

[Get started for free](https://dashboard.rss.com/auth/sign-up/)

No credit card information required

Our plans, your terms
---------------------

Start for FreeNo credit card required. Try all the features for free.

No contractsNo fine print. Cancel or redirect any time.

Money-back guarantee30-days money back guarantee. No questions asked.

![Image 4](https://rss.com/svg/pricing/NonProfitBackground.svg)

#### RSS.com for Non-Profits

We are proud to offer special discounted and plans to students, educators and nonprofit NGOs worldwide.

[Contact us](https://rss.com/pricing/#)

### Give the Gift of Voice

Share the joy of podcasting and empower your loved ones to amplify their voice, share their knowledge, and entertain the world.

Gift card

#### Already got a podcast?

**Switch to RSS.com now and enjoy 6 months free** with [unlimited features](https://rss.com/features/)! Moving your podcast to RSS.com is fast and easy. Your show will be available during the transfer so your followers won't miss a thing.

Switch to RSS.com now

... and get 6 months free!

Stellar Customer Satisfaction
-----------------------------

We provide our podcasters with world-class support and the resources they need to grow. Start your show today and see why thousands of happy podcasters choose RSS.com.

Our users have the last word

**4.95** Rating

pricing_data.pricing_notes: The service offers a free trial with no credit card required and a money-back guarantee.

Ideal for new podcasters, independent podcasters, and businesses.
